sentence: Your thumbprint will give you access to the secret room.
sentence_tra: 你拇指的指纹可以让你进入那个密室。

sentence: The battle between good and evil never ends.
sentence_tra: 正义与邪恶的斗争从未结束。

mean_cn: n. 关心，担忧v. 感兴趣；涉及；使担忧
sentence: She shows her concern by helping me walk.
sentence_tra: 她通过帮助我走路来表达她的关心。

sentence: The plural form of the word "fish" is still "fish".
sentence_tra: “fish”这个单词的复数仍然是“fish”。

sentence: We rented a high-class car for our wedding.
sentence_tra: 我们为了婚礼租了一辆高级轿车。

mean_cn: adj. 实际的；实用的；实践的
sentence: My daughter's very practical - she's helping to build our house.
sentence_tra: 我女儿很善于实践，她在帮助我们建造房子。

sentence: The character of the left is complicated. Can we simplify it, like on the right?
sentence_tra: 左边的字很复杂，我们能不能简化它，像右边一样？

sentence: It's easy to distinguish the blue man from the gray men.
sentence_tra: 很容易就能把小蓝人从小灰人中辨别出来。

sentence: Step aside to let the cars pass.
sentence_tra: 靠边让车通行。

sentence: Bacon is made from pig meat.
sentence_tra: 培根是用猪肉做的。

sentence: I hesitated by the signpost, wondering which way to go.
sentence_tra: 我在这个路标前犹豫不决，想知道到底该走哪条路。

sentence: She observes the liquid very carefully.
sentence_tra: 她观察液体时十分仔细。

sentence: I don't know why that strange man is staring at me.
sentence_tra: 我不知道为什么那个陌生人一直盯着我。

sentence: The compass was originally invented in China.
sentence_tra: 指南针最早发明于中国。

mean_cn: adj. 凸起的；举起的；发酵的；浮雕的
sentence: "Cheers!" she said with her wine glass raised.
sentence_tra: “干杯！”她举起酒杯说到。

sentence: I could hardly see him through the darkness.
sentence_tra: 在黑暗中我几乎看不清他。

sentence: I took a big bite out of my sandwich.
sentence_tra: 我猛咬了一大口三明治。

sentence: He walked towards the city in the distance.
sentence_tra: 他朝着远方的城市走去。

mean_cn: n. 吊顶;  天花板, 屋顶;  adj. 在头顶上的, 上面的;  架空的;  adv. 在头顶, 在上面;
sentence: They couldn't hear each other because of the noise of the helicopter overhead.
sentence_tra: 因为头顶上空的直升机的噪声他们听不到彼此在说什么。

mean_cn: n.珠宝, 镶嵌有宝石之饰物
sentence: You look ridiculous when you wear too much jewellery .
sentence_tra: 当你带着太多珠宝时你看起来很可笑。

sentence: I recognize you! We were in middle school together!
sentence_tra: 我认出你来了，我们曾经一起上高中！

mean_cn: adj.(about)忧虑的，担心的，焦急的；渴望的
sentence: I feel really anxious about the speech I have to give tomorrow.
sentence_tra: 一想到我明天的演讲我就非常焦虑。

sentence: Water flows from the tap.
sentence_tra: 水从龙头流出来。

mean_cn: adv.坚定地，坚决地；坚固地，稳固地
sentence: They held hands firmly as if they never wanted to let go.
sentence_tra: 他们紧握双手就好像他们永远不想放开。

sentence: This overcoat keeps me warm and comfortable in the winter.
sentence_tra: 这件大衣在冬天很保暖舒适。

sentence: A misty fog floats above the trees.
sentence_tra: 模糊的雾气绕在树木的上方。

sentence: My grandfather needs a helper since he can't do many things by himself.
sentence_tra: 我的祖父需要一个帮手，因为他许多事都不能自己做。

sentence: You might see dogs at the airport sniffing for illegal drugs.
sentence_tra: 你可能会在机场看见狗在嗅毒品的味道。

mean_cn: n. 低声细语;  悄悄话;  vi. 耳语, 密谈;  vt. 低声低语地讲;  私下说;
sentence: They are whispering as they are talking about gossips.
sentence_tra: 她们在窃窃私语地谈论着他人的八卦。

sentence: What will she wish for when she blows out the candles?
sentence_tra: 吹蜡烛时，她会许什么愿呢？

sentence: The paper is covered with many small dots.
sentence_tra: 这张纸被很多小圆点覆盖。

sentence: There is always light during summer at the North Pole.
sentence_tra: 北极的夏季有极昼现象。

mean_cn: n.雷，雷声，轰隆声v.打雷，发出轰隆声
sentence: Thunder and lightning scare me so much!
sentence_tra: 打雷和闪电吓坏我了！

sentence: After the DNA had been analysed, we found the criminal.
sentence_tra: 分析过DNA之后我们找到了罪犯。

mean_cn: adv.什么地方都没有；任何地方都不

sentence_tra: 没有地方可以找到水。

mean_cn: n.听觉，听距，听证会，申辩的机会
sentence: His hearing is not so good.
sentence_tra: 他的听力不是很好。

mean_cn: n.理解；紧握，把手v.领会，理解；抓住
sentence: Grasp the bar tightly so you don't fall off.
sentence_tra: 紧紧抓住杆你才不会掉下来。

sentence: This triangle represents the different qualities of a project.
sentence_tra: 这个三角代表了一个项目的不同因素。

sentence: I've never seen a shark so close!
sentence_tra: 我从来没有这么近距离看过鲨鱼。

sentence: Beautiful flowers were kept in the red vase.
sentence_tra: 红色的花瓶中插着漂亮的花。

mean_cn: n. 解脱；减轻；安慰；浮雕
sentence: Ahh, it's such a relief to finally finish my work.
sentence_tra: 啊，完成工作真是放松啊。

mean_cn: n. 售票员;  指挥;  导体;
sentence: This conductor wears a mustache to show the orchestra how artistic he is.
sentence_tra: 指挥为了向乐团展示他的艺术范儿（特意）留长了胡子。

sentence: She glanced at me once, but didn't look at me for the rest of the night.
sentence_tra: 那晚，她瞥了我一眼之后没再看过我。

sentence: I have reduced my weight by a few kilos.
sentence_tra: 我已经减了几公斤体重。

sentence: You should attach your name to your luggage in case it gets lost.
sentence_tra: 为了以防万一，你应该把你的名字系在行李上。

mean_cn: n. 记号，符号；标志v. 签署

sentence_tra: 请在虚线上签名。

mean_cn: n.残疾；无能；无资格；不利条件
sentence: Even though the boy has a disability, he still enjoys making art with his dog.
sentence_tra: 尽管这个男孩儿有残疾，但是他仍然乐于和他的狗一起搞艺术创作。

mean_cn: n. 拳头;  笔迹;  vt. 用拳头打;  握成拳;  紧握;

sentence_tra: 男孩握紧拳头，一脸雄心勃勃的样子。

sentence: I will meet you on the other side of the narrow alley.
sentence_tra: 我在窄巷子那头等你。

mean_cn: n.交通费，乘客，食物v.（事）进行得（好或坏）

sentence_tra: 这一程巴士收费2美元。

sentence: I sweat a lot whenever I get to work.
sentence_tra: 我每次去上班路上都会出很多汗。

sentence: Santa is famous for his big white beard.
sentence_tra: 圣诞老人因他的白色大胡子而出名。

sentence: Wherever you want your package to go, we can deliver it.
sentence_tra: 无论你想让你的行李去哪儿，我们都能传送。

sentence: Thank you so much; I'm very grateful for your gift.
sentence_tra: 太谢谢啦！非常感谢你的礼物！

sentence: The teeth in my upper and lower jaw fit together perfectly.
sentence_tra: 我的上下颚牙齿咬合很好。

sentence: Use different types of bait to attract different fish.
sentence_tra: 用不同类型的诱饵去吸引不同的鱼。

sentence: The telephone pole holds the cables.
sentence_tra: 电线杆支撑着电缆。

mean_cn: n.波浪，(挥手)示意，起伏v.(挥手)示意，波动，飘动波浪
sentence: The waves are very big in this part of the ocean.
sentence_tra: 在海上的这个区域波浪很大。

sentence: Do computers confuse you as much as they do me?
sentence_tra: 电脑是不是把你搞得和我一样混乱？

sentence: Stop ignoring me--say something!
sentence_tra: 别无视我啊，说话！

mean_cn: n. 迷惑；拼图；难题v. 使迷惑

sentence_tra: 这张拼图里只缺一块了。

sentence: The forest is covered in mist.
sentence_tra: 这片森林被薄雾覆盖。

sentence_tra: 我割到了自己，我需要有人来帮我，你会急救吗？

sentence: The soldier looked for enemies.
sentence_tra: 这个士兵在寻找敌人。

mean_cn: n. 相反，对立面adj. 相反的，对立的，矛盾的

sentence_tra: 我妹妹太叛逆了，我说什么她都不赞同。

mean_cn: 看得见； 被看到； 在即； 在望

sentence_tra: 终于看见船了。

mean_cn: n.公牛，雄性的鲸、象等大动物

sentence_tra: 公牛很危险，小心一点。

sentence: We are hopeful that the baby will be healthy.
sentence_tra: 我们希望婴儿出生健康。

sentence: All the stuff was carried in the lorry.
sentence_tra: 所有货物都搬上卡车了。

mean_cn: n. 脚步;  脚步声;  一步的距离;  足迹;

sentence_tra: “我瘦了好多，以前的裤子都松得不能穿了！”

sentence_tra: 我们预测在接下来一年生意会更好。

sentence_tra: 他正向需要帮助的朋友伸出援手。

sentence_tra: 你不觉得我穿这衣服很帅吗？

sentence_tra: 我们在迷雾森林中迷路了。

sentence: Spending the afternoon at the spa really helped calm me down.
sentence_tra: 用了一下午做spa真的有助于镇定自己。

sentence: When I camp in the mountains, I always wear hiking boots.
sentence_tra: 当我在山上露营时，我总是穿登山鞋。

mean_cn: n. 志愿者;  志愿兵;  义务工作者;  vi. 自愿;  adj. 志愿的;  义务的;  自愿者的;  vt. 自愿做…;  自愿献出;

sentence_tra: “有没有人自愿打扫公园？”“我愿意。”

sentence: The pigeon is taking a rest on the tree.
sentence_tra: 这只鸽子正在树上休息。

sentence: After she fell she reached for her shoes in a panic.
sentence_tra: 跌倒之后她慌张地捡起了鞋子。

sentence: There was a lot of lightning during the storm last night.
sentence_tra: 昨晚风暴来袭时电闪雷鸣。

sentence: The elephants are approaching us.

mean_cn: adj.有可能；可信的；适合的adv.很可能

sentence: Deer always have to watch out for hunters.
